name: Dice Tower (Josh and Rebecca)
description:
Roll the dice to determine how much time you have to beat each level! In Dice Tower,
Beat each level before the time is up!  
Your time is decided by a roll of the dice.  
Find and collect more dice to improve your odds!  
Can you make it to the top of Dice Tower? Dice Tower is a simple 2D platformer,
made in 48 hours by a team of two people.NOTE: Hold Left Shift to run! 

DICE TOWER is our submission to the 2022 GMTK Game Jam, for the theme "Roll of the Dice"
We included a mix of both open source art assets, and original artwork (specified in credits below).  
Unfortunately, we did not have time to create music or sound effects, so there is no sound in the game.
